text: Although photographers took many pictures of people of color during the Great Depression, Sarah Boxer writes, the preeminent photographic record of the period left them out. https://t.co/3KhdAejc3n

text: The U.S. government has left a void in guidance about Thanksgiving this year. @jameshamblin clarifies why staying home is so important, as difficult as it may be: https://t.co/fLXLNGUkQD
